title: I got the poro Icon and Kayle but not the riot skin
body: Hello I got the poro icon today and noticed that i have kayle, but i haven't purchased her. Is there any chance that i will get the skin aswell or not?

replies.body: Yes, there is. It's normal to receive to receive the gifts separately. The gifts are still being distributed, so just hang tight and you should receive Riot Kayle soon enough.
We've extended the deadline for gifts to the 30th, so if you haven't received Riot Kayle by then, let me know.
